TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSource extends System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl

summary.span: 表示为多层 Web 应用程序体系结构中的数据绑定控件提供数据的业务对象。

span.span: Represents a business object that provides data to data-bound controls in multitier Web application architectures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [目的Purpose](#purpose) - [检索数据Retrieving Data](#retrieving_data) - [执行数据操作Performing Data Operations](#performing_data_operations) - [筛选数据Filtering Data](#filtering_data) - [缓存Caching](#caching) - [功能Features](#features) - [数据视图Data View](#data_view) - [使用 LINQ to SQLUsing LINQ to SQL](#using_linq_to_sql) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件的工作方式与你创建的类。An control works with a class that you create. 创建方法用于检索和更新数据，并提供对这些方法的名称标记中的控件。You create methods that retrieve and update data, and you provide the names of those methods to the control in markup. 在呈现或回发处理期间调用具有指定的方法。During rendering or postback processing, the calls the methods that you have specified. 任何可视化呈现控件。There is no visual rendering of the control. 因此，不支持视觉特征，如或属性。As a result, the does not support visual features such as the or property. ## 目标Purpose 非常常见的应用程序设计做法是从业务逻辑分离表示层并封装业务对象中的业务逻辑。A very common application design practice is to separate the presentation layer from business logic and to encapsulate the business logic in business objects. 这些业务对象形成表示层和数据层，从而在三层应用程序体系结构之间的不同层。These business objects form a distinct layer between the presentation layer and the data tier, resulting in a three-tier application architecture. 控件使开发人员能够使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件，同时保留其三层应用程序体系结构。The control enables developers to use an ASP.NET data source control while retaining their three-tier application architecture. 控件使用反射来创建业务对象的实例，若要对其检索，调用方法更新、 插入和删除数据。The control uses reflection to create instances of business objects and to call methods on them to retrieve, update, insert, and delete data. 属性标识的类名称的配合。The property identifies the name of the class that the works with. 控件创建和销毁每个方法调用类的实例; 它不保存该对象在内存中的 Web 请求生存期内。The control creates and destroys an instance of the class for each method call; it does not hold the object in memory for the lifetime of the Web request. 如果您使用的业务对象需要多个资源，或在其他方面成本高昂，来创建和销毁，这是一个严重的考虑因素。This is a serious consideration if the business object that you use requires many resources or is otherwise expensive to create and destroy. 使用的高开销对象可能不是最佳设计选择，但可以通过使用控制对象的生命周期， ，和事件。Using an expensive object might not be an optimal design choice, but you can control the life cycle of the object by using the , , and events. > [!NOTE] > 由标识的方法， ， ，和属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 的方法。The methods that are identified by the , , , and properties can be instance methods or `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods. 如果方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，未创建业务对象的实例，并， ，和不会引发事件。If the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance of the business object is not created, and the , , and events are not raised. ## 检索数据Retrieving Data 若要从业务对象中检索数据，设置属性设置为检索数据的方法的名称。To retrieve data from a business object, set the property to the name of the method that retrieves data. 如果该方法不返回或对象，该对象包装由运行时中集合。If the method does not return an or object, the object is wrapped by the runtime in an collection. 如果方法签名具有参数，您可以添加对象添加到集合，然后将其绑定到想要传递给由指定的方法的值和属性。If the method signature has parameters, you can add objects to the collection, and then bind them to the values that you want to pass to the method that is specified by the property. 为了使控件使用的参数，参数必须与匹配的名称和方法签名中的参数的类型。In order for the control to use the parameters, the parameters must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 控件中检索数据时调用方法。The control retrieves data whenever the method is called. 此方法提供以编程方式访问由指定的方法属性。This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by property. 通过指定的方法属性将自动调用绑定到控件时其`DataBind`调用方法。The method that is specified by the property is called automatically by controls that are bound to the when their `DataBind` method is called. 如果您设置`DataSourceID`数据绑定控件的属性，该控件自动将绑定到数据从数据源，根据需要。If you set the `DataSourceID` property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as needed. 设置`DataSourceID`属性是绑定的建议的方法数据绑定控件的控件。Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an control to a data-bound control. 或者，可以设置`DataSource`属性，但您必须显式调用`DataBind`数据绑定控件的方法。Alternatively, you can set the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method of the data-bound control. 您可以调用以编程方式在任何时间检索数据的方法。You can call the method programmatically at any time to retrieve data. 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[数据源控件绑定到数据使用](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。For more information about binding data-bound controls to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7). ## 执行数据操作Performing Data Operations 具体取决于业务的功能对象控件一起使用，则可以执行数据操作，例如更新、 插入和删除操作。Depending on the capabilities of the business object that the control works with, you can perform data operations, such as updates, insertions, and deletions. 若要执行这些数据操作，设置适当的方法名称和你想要执行的操作关联的任何参数。To perform these data operations, set the appropriate method name and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform. 例如，对于更新操作，设置属性的名称的业务对象方法执行更新，并添加任何所需的参数集合。For example, for an update operation, set the property to the name of the business object method that performs updates and add any required parameters to the collection. 如果数据绑定控件与关联控件时，由数据绑定控件添加参数。If the control is associated with a data-bound control, the parameters are added by the data-bound control. 在这种情况下，您需要确保该方法的参数名称匹配的数据绑定控件中的字段名称。In this case, you need to ensure that the parameter names of the method match the field names in the data-bound control. 执行更新时由代码显式或通过数据绑定控件自动调用方法。The update is performed when the method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control. 对于遵循相同的常规模式和操作。The same general pattern is followed for and operations. 业务对象被认为这些类型的数据操作一条记录执行一次，而不是批处理。Business objects are assumed to perform these types of data operations one record at a time, rather than batched. ## 筛选数据Filtering Data 控件可以通过检索的数据进行筛选，则为该数据返回为属性或对象。The control can filter data that is retrieved by the property, if the data is returned as a or object. 可以设置属性设置为使用一种格式的筛选表达式字符串语法并将值绑定到参数中指定的表达式中集合。You can set the property to a filtering expression by using a format string syntax and bind values in the expression to parameters that are specified in the collection. ## 缓存Caching 尽管不会保留该实例的多个请求间的业务对象，它可以缓存的调用通过标识的方法的结果属性。Although the does not retain the instance of the business object across multiple requests, it can cache the result of calling the method identified by the property. 数据缓存，因为在后续调用时方法返回缓存的数据，而不是创建业务对象并调用其使用反射。While the data is cached, subsequent calls to the method return the cached data instead of creating the business object and calling its using reflection. 缓存可避免创建对象和 Web 服务器上调用代价内存是其数据方法。Caching lets you avoid creating the object and calling its data method at the expense of memory on the Web server. 会自动调整缓存数据时属性设置为`true`，和属性设置为在缓存中存储数据之前放弃缓存的秒数。The automatically caches data when the property is set to `true`, and the property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is discarded. 此外可以指定属性和可选属性。You can also specify a property and an optional property. 控制允许您缓存所有类型的数据，但不是应都缓存保留资源或不能共享多个请求提供服务的状态的对象 (例如，一种开放对象)，因为该对象的同一实例将用于多个请求提供服务。The control allows you to cache all types of data, but you should not cache objects that retain resources or state that cannot be shared to service multiple requests (for example, an open object), because the same instance of the object will be used to service multiple requests. ## 功能Features 下表介绍的功能控件。The following table describes the features of the control. |功能Capability|要求Requirements| |----------------|------------------| |选择Selecting|设置属性的名称的业务对象方法选择数据，并包含任何必需的参数中集合以编程方式或通过使用数据绑定控件。Set the property to the name of the business object method that selects data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection either programmatically or by using a data-bound control.| |排序Sorting|设置属性中的参数的名称为带有排序条件的方法。Set the property to the name of the parameter in the method that carries the sort criteria.| |筛选Filtering|设置属性的筛选表达式，还可以选择添加到任何参数要筛选的数据集合时调用方法。Set the property to a filtering expression and optionally add any parameters to the collection to filter the data when the method is called. 指定的方法属性必须返回或。The method specified by the property must return a or .| |分页Paging|如果支持数据源分页方法包含要检索的记录的最大数和要检索的第一个记录的索引的参数。Data source paging is supported, if the method contains parameters for the maximum number of records to retrieve and the index of the first record to retrieve. 这些参数的名称必须以设置和属性，分别。The names of those parameters must be set in the and properties, respectively. 数据绑定控件可能能够执行分页本身，即使控件不支持直接在指定的方法中的分页属性。A data-bound control might be able to perform paging itself, even if the control does not support paging directly in the method specified by the property. 若要能够执行此操作的数据绑定控件的要求是由指定的方法属性返回一个对象，实现接口。The requirement for the data-bound control to be able to do this is that the method specified by the property return an object that implements the interface.| |UpdatingUpdating|设置属性的名称的业务对象方法，用于更新数据，并包含任何必需的参数中集合。Set the property to the name of the business object method that updates data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |正在删除Deleting|设置属性的名称的业务对象方法或函数删除数据，并包含任何必需的参数中集合。Set the property to the name of the business object method or function that deletes data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |插入Inserting|设置属性的名称的业务对象方法或函数用于在插入数据，并包含任何必需的参数中集合。Set the property to the name of the business object method or function that inserts data, and include any necessary parameters in the collection.| |缓存Caching|设置属性设置为`true`，并和根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为的属性。Set the property to `true`, and the and properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.| > [!NOTE] > 当你使用类来更新或插入数据，在客户端输入的字符串数据自动进行转换从客户端区域性格式为 server 区域性格式。When you use the class to update or insert data, strings that are entered at the client are not automatically converted from the client culture format to the server culture format. 例如，客户端区域性可能会指定 DD/MM/YYYY 为日期格式，并且在服务器上的日期格式可能 MM/DD/YYYY。For example, the client culture might specify DD/MM/YYYY as the date format, and the date format on the server might be MM/DD/YYYY. 在这种情况下，将在输入 2009 年 10 月 5 日控制为 2009 年 5 月 10 日，但会被解释为 2009 年 5 月 10 日。In that case, October 5, 2009 would be entered in a control as 5/10/2009 but would be interpreted as May 10, 2009. 2009 年 10 月 15 日 15/10/2009，如下所示输入，并将拒绝为无效日期。October 15, 2009 would be entered as 15/10/2009, and would be rejected as an invalid date. ## 数据视图Data View 与所有数据源控件一样，控件所关联的数据源视图类。As with all data source controls, the control is associated with a data source view class. 虽然控件是页面开发人员用来处理数据，接口类是数据绑定控件使用的接口。While the control is the interface that the page developer uses to work with data, the class is the interface that data-bound controls work with. 此外，类描述数据源控件的功能，并执行实际工作。Additionally, the class describes the capabilities of the data source control, and performs the actual work. 控件仅有一个关联，并且始终名为`DefaultView`。The control has only one associated , and it is always named `DefaultView`. 虽然公开对象方法，其属性和方法的许多包装，并将其直接通过公开控件。While the object is exposed by the method, many of its properties and methods are wrapped and exposed directly by the control. 在后台，对象执行所有数据操作，包括检索、 插入、 更新、 删除、 筛选和对数据进行排序。Behind the scenes, the object performs all data operations, including retrieving, inserting, updating, deleting, filtering, and sorting the data. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## 使用 LINQ to SQLUsing LINQ to SQL 可以使用使用 LINQ to SQL 类的控件。You can use the control with a LINQ to SQL class. 若要执行此操作，请设置属性设置为数据上下文类的名称。To do so, you set the property to the name of the data-context class. 此外设置， ， ，和执行相应操作中的数据上下文类的方法的方法。You also set the , , , and methods to the methods in the data-context class that perform the corresponding operations. 必须创建的事件处理程序才能取消对数据上下文类的释放的事件。You must create an event handler for the event in order to cancel disposing of the data-context class. 此步骤是必需因为 LINQ to SQL 支持延迟的执行，而控件尝试选择操作之后释放数据上下文。This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation. 有关如何创建 LINQ to SQL 类的详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information about how to create LINQ to SQL classes, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). 有关如何取消对数据上下文类的释放的示例，请参阅事件。For an example of how to cancel the disposing of a data context class, see the event. ## 使用实体框架Using the Entity Framework 此外可以使用使用实体框架的控件。You can also use the control with the Entity Framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用实体框架和 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117)。For more information, see [Using the Entity Framework and the ObjectDataSource Control](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ``` ## Examples 包含源代码的 Visual Studio Web 站点项目是可随附于本主题：[下载](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838)。A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838). 本部分介绍中的标记中一个.aspx 页面，它显示适用于的业务对象。This section shows an in markup in an .aspx page and it shows the business objects that it works with. 该示例是.aspx 页。The example is the .aspx page. 它包含绑定到控件控件。It contains a control that is bound to an control. 控件标记指定的业务对象的名称和要调用以检索数据的业务对象方法的名称。The control markup specifies the name of the business object and the name of the business object method to call in order to retrieve data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/objds1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/objds1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示的业务对象.aspx 页中的控件使用。The following example shows the business object that the control in the .aspx page uses. (许多其他代码示例还使用此业务对象。)此示例由以下两个基本类组成：(Many other code examples use this business object also.) The example consists of the following two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`类是业务逻辑类使用。The `EmployeeLogic` class is the business logic class that the uses. - `NorthwindEmployee`类定义返回的数据对象`GetAllEmployees`方法的`EmployeeLogic`类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class defines the data object that is returned by the `GetAllEmployees` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class. 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供便利。An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 这组示例类适用于在 Northwind Trader 数据库，这是适用于 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access。This set of example classes works with the Northwind Traders database, which is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用这些类与所提供的.aspx 页面示例。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the .aspx page example that is provided. 有关如何安装 Northwind Trader 数据库的信息，请参阅[如何：安装示例数据库](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed1291f6-604c-4972-ae22-0345c6dea12e)。For information about how to install the Northwind Traders database, see [How to: Install Sample Databases](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed1291f6-604c-4972-ae22-0345c6dea12e). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/CS/northwindemployee1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_1/VB/northwindemployee1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`typeName`参数可以是位于 Bin 或 App_Code 目录中的代码的部分限定的类型或在全局程序集缓存中注册的代码的完全限定的类型名称。The value of the `typeName` parameter can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directory or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache. 如果使用全局程序集缓存，则必须添加到适当的引用`assemblies`Machine.config 或 Web.config 配置文件的部分。If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file.

summary.span: 获取或设置以秒为单位的一段时间，数据源控件就在这段时间内缓存 属性检索到的数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the property.

value.span: 将 属性调用的结果缓存的秒数。

span.span: The number of seconds that the caches the results of a property invocation.

value.span: 默认值为 0。

span.span: The default is 0.

value.span: 该值不能为负数。

span.span: The value cannot be negative.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持的数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据，而调用方法检索的数据缓存中而不是从业务对象配合。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 缓存过期时，方法业务对象中检索数据，并再次将缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被放弃。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值为 0 表示无限期的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 持续时间的组合来管理缓存和设置。The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the setting. 如果属性设置为值，缓存上首次调用数据方法并使其在内存中保持为最多由指定的时间量属性。If the property is set to the value, the caches data on the first call to the method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the property. 如果需要内存，可能会持续时间之前释放数据。The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed. 在下一步调用然后刷新缓存方法。The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the method. 如果属性设置为值，数据源控件缓存数据到在首次调用方法，但将其保存到每个后续调用上的缓存的时间范围重置方法。If the property is set to value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache on each subsequent call to the method. 缓存过期后，如果没有任何活动的时间，它等于属性自上次调用以来方法。The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the property since the last call to the method. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何对象支持缓存。The first code example demonstrates how an object supports caching. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现返回的包装器方法对象，以允许缓存对象。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching with an object. 下面的代码示例演示如何控件支持缓存。The following code example demonstrates how an control supports caching. 若要启用缓存，必须实现用于检索数据，通过标识的方法属性，以返回数据作为对象。To enable caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the property, to return the data as a object. 在此示例中，属性设置为`true`，并和设置属性。In this example, the property is set to `true`, and the and properties are set. 将返回的数据缓存30 秒的属性。The caches data that is returned by the property for 30 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/CS/objds6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/VB/objds6vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现返回的包装器方法对象，以允许缓存控件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching with an control. 在基实现中的`EmployeeLogic`类，`GetAllEmployees`方法将返回对象。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an object. 而不是重构完全要使用的对象包装器方法在 Web 窗体页中，名为`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`返回的一组添加`NorthwindEmployee`数据作为。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/CS/northwindemployee5.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_5/VB/northwindemployee5.vb#3)]

Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何对象支持筛选和缓存。The first code example demonstrates how an object supports filtering and caching. 第二个代码示例演示如何实现返回的包装器方法对象，以允许的缓存和筛选对象。The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an object. 下面的代码示例演示如何控件支持筛选和缓存。The following code example demonstrates how an control supports filtering and caching. 若要启用筛选和缓存，必须实现用于检索数据，通过标识的方法属性，以返回数据作为对象。To enable filtering and caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the property, to return the data as a object. 在此示例中，缓存启用，因为`EmployeeLogic`数据作为对象返回，则属性设置为`true`，并和设置属性。In this example, caching is enabled because the `EmployeeLogic` object returns data as a , the property is set to `true`, and the and properties are set. 将返回的数据缓存30 秒的属性。The caches data that is returned by the property for 30 seconds. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/CS/objds6cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_6/VB/objds6vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何实现返回的包装器方法对象，以允许的缓存和筛选控件。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a object to enable caching and filtering with an control. 在基实现中的`EmployeeLogic`类，`GetAllEmployees`方法将返回。In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an . 而不是重构完全要使用的对象包装器方法在 Web 窗体页中，名为`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`返回的一组添加`NorthwindEmployee`数据作为。Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个用户定义的键依赖项，该键依赖项链接到数据源控件创建的所有数据缓存对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a user-defined key dependency that is linked to all data cache objects that are created by the data source control.

value.span: 一个键，它标识所有由 创建的缓存对象。

span.span: A key that identifies all cache objects created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为任何任意字符串值。The property can be set to any arbitrary string value. 当键到期时，所有缓存对象都显式到期。All cache objects are explicitly expired when the key is expired. 这使您可以使创建的缓存项失效以编程方式从您自己的页面代码。This allows you to invalidate cache entries that are created by the from your own page code programmatically. 控件支持的数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据，而调用方法检索的数据缓存中而不是从业务对象配合。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the works with. 缓存过期时，方法业务对象中检索数据，并再次将缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被放弃。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值为 0 表示无限期的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. 可以设置要创建的所有高速缓存条目之间建立依赖关系属性控件和密钥。You can set the property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the control and the key. 通过使键可以在任何时间以编程方式终止所有缓存条目。You can expire all the cache entries programmatically at any time by expiring the key. 通过使用过期密钥方法，将当前值作为参数。Expire the key by using the method with the current value as the parameter. 为每个组合创建唯一缓存项， ， ， ，和属性。A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the , , , , and properties. 多个控件可以使用相同的缓存条目在方案中使用相同的类型、 方法和参数的数据的加载位置。Multiple controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where they load data using the same type, method, and parameters. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示 Web 页面、 代码隐藏页类和从 Northwind 数据库中的员工表中检索记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示包含两个网页控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示数据库中的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索和显示用户所选的员工记录。The second control and the control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user. 为启用缓存控件。Caching is enabled for the control. 因此，每条记录检索从数据库仅一次。Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database. 属性设置为"EmployeeDetails"，但任何字符串值可作为键。The property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key. Web 页面还包括用户可以单击过期的缓存的数据的控件。The Web page also includes a control that the user can click to expire the cached data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx#3)] 第二个示例显示了一个处理程序事件和处理程序事件的控件。The second example shows a handler for the event and a handler for the event of the control. 事件处理程序使用密钥设置为创建的缓存项值。The event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the value. 事件处理程序中移除其键等于的缓存项值。The event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the value. 当移除缓存项时，依赖于该密钥的所有缓存的数据已过期。When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#4)] 第三个示例显示了与 Northwind 数据库进行交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询员工表。The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类表示 Northwind 数据库和雇员表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table. 有关更多信息，请参见[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是仅将新值传递给 方法，还是将旧值和新值都传递给 方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether or not just the new values are passed to the method or both the old and new values are passed to the method.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定是否将旧的和新值的参数应用于指定的方法属性。This property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the method specified by the property. 有关示例，该方法是否由指定属性返回控件的列`Name`和`Number`，和属性设置为字段，用于创建参数`Name`并`Number`为`Update`方法。For example, if the method that is specified by the property returns a control with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the property is set to the field, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method. 如果属性设置为值，用于创建参数`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，并`original_Number`。If the property is set to the value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`. (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称属性。)然后确定方法是否在指定属性具有相匹配的参数。(The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the property.) The then determines whether the method that is specified in the property has parameters that match. 并发控制是一种数据存储区使用的控件如何读取和在多个客户端访问和操作同一数据存储区中更改数据的技术。Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data. 例如，一个客户端读取数据并呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据并呈现给其他用户。For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data and presents it to a different user. 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交到数据存储，则可能会出现了意外的结果，因为这两个客户端可能会提供不同的值相同的数据。If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, an unexpected result might occur, because both clients might provide different values for the same data. 这被视为冲突。This is considered a conflict. 通过设置属性设置为值，`Update`方法然后可以比较旧和新值传递到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并在必要时处理它们。By setting the property to the value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as necessary. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不转换`null`到值会在运行时导致错误。Not converting `null` to the value can result in errors at run time. 使用属性以指示是否传递给更新、 插入或删除操作的值自动转换从`null`到值控件。Use the property to indicate whether values that are passed to an update, insert, or delete operation are automatically converted from `null` to the value by the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置某个类的名称， 控件将该类用于更新、插入或删除数据操作中的参数，而不是从数据绑定控件传递个别的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of a class that the control uses for a parameter in an update, insert, or delete data operation, instead of passing individual values from the data-bound control.

value.span: 部分或完全限定类名，用于标识可由 用作 、 或 操作的参数的对象类型。

span.span: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the can use as a parameter for an , , or a operation.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是指定多个参数传递给， ，和方法，您可以创建多个数据字段值聚合的一个对象。Instead of specifying several parameters that are passed to the , , and methods, you can create one object that aggregates several data field values. 此对象传递给方法，而不是几个参数。This one object is passed to the methods, instead of several parameters. 默认行为绑定到数据绑定控件的控件是数据绑定控件创建数据源中每个参数的对象。The default behavior of an control that is bound to a data-bound control is that the data-bound control creates a object for each parameter in the data source. 如果业务对象具有许多字段，生成的方法还具有许多字段。If the business object has many fields, the resulting method also has many fields. 属性可以指定具有每个数据字段的属性的类型。The property allows you to specify a type that has a property for each data field. 然后，而不是将多个参数传递给方法，在运行时创建一个对象，并设置其所有属性。Then, instead of passing several parameters to the method, the runtime creates one object and sets all of its properties. 这一个对象添加到方法调用的参数集合。This one object is added to the parameters collection for the method call. 通过指定的类型属性必须具有默认构造函数没有参数，因此控件可以创建类型的实例。The type that is specified by the property must have a default constructor that has no parameters, so the control can create an instance of the type. 此类型还必须具有可设置的属性，允许控件以使用从数据绑定控件传递的值填充该对象。The type must also have settable properties that allow the control to populate the object with values that are passed from the data-bound control. 属性名控件需要与数据绑定控件传递的值的参数名称完全匹配。The property names on the control are expected to exactly match the parameter names of values that are passed by the data-bound control. 当属性设置和控件是与数据绑定控件，由指定的方法相关联和属性必须每个具有一个中指定的类型参数属性。When the property is set and the control is associated with a data-bound control, the methods that are specified by the and properties must each have one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 如果属性设置为值，通过指定的方法属性必须有一个参数中指定的类型的属性。If the property is set to the value, the method that is specified by the property must have one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 如果属性设置为值，通过指定的方法属性必须具有两个参数中指定的类型的属性。If the property is set to the value, the method that is specified by the property must have two parameters of the type that is specified in the property. 第一个参数包含的原始值;第二个参数包含新值。The first parameter contains the original values; the second parameter contains the new values. 属性委托给的属性关联控件。The property delegates to the property of the that is associated with the control. ## Examples 部分包含两个代码示例。The section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何实现一个将所有参数值都合并到一个对象，类型使用属性。The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the property. 第二个代码示例演示使用中的第一个代码示例使用两个类的网页。The second code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个将所有参数值都合并到一个对象，类型使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the property. Select 方法的`AggregateData`类返回对象包含两个名为的列`Name`和`Number`。The select method of the `AggregateData` class returns a object with two columns named `Name` and `Number`. 同样，`NewData`类定义两个读/写属性，`Name`和`Number`。Similarly, the `NewData` class defines two read/write properties, `Name` and `Number`. `Insert`方法`AggregateData`类采用一个参数类型的`NewData`。The `Insert` method of the `AggregateData` class takes one parameter of type `NewData`. `TypeName`的属性设置为`AggregateData`并且属性设置为`NewData`。The `TypeName` property of the is set to `AggregateData` and the property is set to `NewData`. [!code-csharp[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/CS/AggregateData.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ObjectDataSourceDataObjectTypeName/VB/AggregateData.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例显示了使用在前面的代码示例使用两个类的网页。The following code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the preceding code example. summary.span: 通过用 集合中的所有参数调用由 属性标识的方法，执行删除操作。

span.span: Performs a delete operation by calling the method that is identified by the property with any parameters that are in the collection.

returns.span: 如果在 事件中设置了 的 属性，则为表示从基础数据存储中删除的行数的值，否则为 -1。

span.span: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying data storage, if the property of the is set in the event; otherwise, -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前执行操作，则方法调用以引发事件。Before the operation is performed, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理事件，检查参数的值，并执行任何预处理之前操作。You can handle the event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a operation. 若要执行删除操作，对象使用反射来创建由标识的对象的实例属性。To perform a delete operation, the object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the property. 然后，它调用由标识的方法属性，使用任何关联属性。It then calls the method that is identified by the property, using any associated properties. 如果删除参数来自关联的数据绑定控件，根据创建的参数名称属性。If the deletion parameters come from an associated data-bound control, the name of the parameters is created according to the property. 之后操作完成后，方法调用以引发事件。After the operation completes, the method is called to raise the event. 您可以处理事件，以检查任何返回值、 输出参数和异常，并执行所有后期处理步骤。You can handle the event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing. 方法会委托给方法与之关联的对象控件。The method delegates to the method of the object that is associated with the control. ## 数据绑定控件Data-Bound Controls 当控件关联的数据绑定控件，如控件，不需要调用方法从页面代码。When the control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the control, it is not necessary to call the method from page code. 改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用方法。The method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see .

summary.span: 操作完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来检查返回值或输出参数的值或确定后是否引发了异常操作已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a operation has completed. 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性中有与事件相关联的对象。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 可以使用的属性对象返回已从删除的行数方法。You can use the property of the object to return the number of rows that were deleted from the method. 若要执行此操作，设置属性。To do this, set the property. 如果从指定的方法返回的已删除的行数属性的值是从可用属性的对象。If you return the number of deleted rows from the method that is specified by the property, the value is available from the property of the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初，控件显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，删除操作使用由指定的方法执行属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行此操作并`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理后在操作完成执行异常处理的事件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此代码示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`方法。In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DeleteMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DeleteMethod : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件调用以删除数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to delete data.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 用于删除数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to delete data.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假定业务对象，而不是批处理中删除一条数据记录。The business object is assumed to delete data one record at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 请确保为配置的参数名称控件中集合选择的方法返回的列名称匹配。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 通过标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，创建和销毁每次业务对象调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the property is called. 可以处理并事件以使用业务对象之前调用属性。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the property is called. 你还可以处理后引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the property is called. 如果业务对象实现接口，销毁该对象前调用方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 该方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，永远不会创建业务对象，并不能处理， ，和事件。If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合并的参数Parameter Merging 参数添加到从三个源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 从在运行时的数据绑定控件。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从`DeleteParameters`元素，以声明方式。From the `DeleteParameters` element, declaratively. - 从`Deleting`方法，以声明方式。From the `Deleting` method, declaratively. 首先，通过数据绑定控件生成的任何参数添加到集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果控件绑定到具有列控件`Name`并`Number`，参数`Name`和`Number`添加到集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 取决于参数的确切名称属性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 这些参数的数据类型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步、 中列出的参数`DeleteParameters`添加元素。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `DeleteParameters` element are added. 如果中的参数`DeleteParameters`具有相同名称作为参数中已找到的元素修改集合，现有的参数以匹配的参数中指定的`DeleteParameters`元素。If a parameter in the `DeleteParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `DeleteParameters` element. 通常情况下，这用于修改的参数中的数据类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，您可以以编程方式添加和删除中的参数事件之前发生运行方法。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 对参数进行合并后，解析方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 下一节中讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 当调用方法时，从数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`DeleteParameters`元素和参数中的新增所有合并事件处理程序。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `DeleteParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。对象然后尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The object then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它会查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与属性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则引发异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设由指定的类型属性具有两个方法名为`DeleteARecord`。For example, suppose the type that is specified by the property has two methods named `DeleteARecord`. 一个`DeleteARecord`具有一个形参`ID`，和其他`DeleteARecord`具有两个参数`Name`和`Number`。One `DeleteARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `DeleteARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合具有名为只有一个参数`ID`，则`DeleteARecord`方法替换只是`ID`调用参数。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `DeleteARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 参数的类型不会签入解析方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置属性，以不同方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 方法中指定的名称查找中指定属性，它采用一个参数的类型的属性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初，控件显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，删除操作使用由指定的方法执行属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行此操作，并`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理后在操作完成执行异常处理的事件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理`NorthwindDataException`委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindDataException` delegate. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DeleteParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 方法使用的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the method.

value.span: ，包含由 方法使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和类型中包含的参数集合的名称和中的参数的类型必须匹配方法签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 受影响的参数名称属性和区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的参数取决于数据绑定控件、 以声明方式，指定的参数并以编程方式添加的参数的数据。The parameters in the collection depend on the data that is in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 详细信息，请参阅"参数合并"中并[使用的参数与 ObjectDataSource 控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see "Parameter Merging" in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的属性与业务对象的控件和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property of the control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初，控件显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，事件调用含有两个参数。If you click the **Delete** button, the event is called with two parameters. 一个参数`EmpID`，来自控件，并基于属性。One parameter, `EmpID`, comes from the control, and is based on the property. 其他参数来自声明性属性。The other parameter comes from the declarative property. `EmployeeLogic`类重载`DeleteEmployee`方法。The `EmployeeLogic` class overloads the `DeleteEmployee` method. 一个重载采用`NorthwindEmployee`参数，而另一种采用参数名为`anID`。One overload takes a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter, and the other takes an parameter named `anID`. 在中事件中的条目属性会进行调整，以包括名为只有一个参数`anID`中的值`original_EmpID`。In the event, the entries in the property are adjusted to include only one parameter named `anID` with the value from `original_EmpID`. 当事件处理程序存在，匹配`DeleteEmployee`调用方法。When the event handler exists, the matching `DeleteEmployee` method is called. 下面的代码示例显示了显示的网页控件和句柄事件。The following code example shows the Web page that displays the control and handles the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/CS/objds11cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/VB/objds11vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/CS/northwindemployee11.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_11/VB/northwindemployee11.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Deleting As ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler

summary.span: 在 操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的其他初始化控件执行删除操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the delete operation. 参数都可用作访问的集合属性，它公开由对象。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 可以通过设置取消删除操作的属性到`true`。You can cancel the delete operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用对象是否与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an object with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件与业务对象和一个控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初，控件显示的所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组属性来检索从数据`EmployeeLogic`对象。Initially, the control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`，则控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果单击**删除**按钮，删除操作使用由指定的方法执行属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些预处理和后处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`委托调用以处理事件之前执行此操作，并`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托调用以处理后在操作完成执行异常处理的事件。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling. 在此代码示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是抛出，它由处理`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`方法。In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. member this.EnableCaching : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否启用数据缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has data caching enabled.

value.span: 如果为数据源控件启用数据缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持的数据缓存。The control supports data caching. 缓存数据，而调用方法从缓存中检索数据而不是创建业务对象的实例并调用其数据的方法。While data is cached, calls to the method retrieve data from the cache rather than the creating an instance of the business object and calling its data method. 缓存过期时，方法业务对象中检索数据，并再次将缓存数据。When the cache expires, the method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again. 控件将自动缓存数据时属性设置为`true`和属性设置为值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被放弃。The control automatically caches data when the property is set to `true` and the property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded. 值为 0 表示无限期的缓存。A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示 Web 页面、 代码隐藏页类和从 Northwind 数据库中的员工表中检索记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示包含两个网页控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示数据库中的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索和显示用户所选的员工记录。The second control and the control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user. 为启用缓存控件。Caching is enabled for the control. 因此，每条记录检索从数据库仅一次。Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database. 属性设置为"EmployeeDetails"，但任何字符串值可作为键。The property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key. Web 页面还包括用户可以单击过期的缓存的数据的控件。The Web page also includes a control that the user can click to expire the cached data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx#3)] 第二个示例显示了一个处理程序事件和处理程序事件的控件。The second example shows a handler for the event and a handler for the event of the control. 事件处理程序使用密钥设置为创建的缓存项值。The event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the value. 事件处理程序中移除其键等于的缓存项值。The event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the value. 当移除缓存项时，依赖于该密钥的所有缓存的数据已过期。When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default2.aspx.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default2.aspx.vb#4)] 第三个示例显示了与 Northwind 数据库进行交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询员工表。The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类表示 Northwind 数据库和雇员表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table. 有关更多信息，请参见[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

member this.EnablePaging : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据源控件是否支持对它检索的数据集进行分页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source control supports paging through the set of data that it retrieves.

value.span: 如果数据源控件通过它检索的数据支持分页，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过分页控制处理通过设置， ， ，和属性的和 select 方法定义中使用适当的参数的业务对象。Paging by the control is handled by setting the , , , and properties of the and defining a select method in the business object with the proper parameters. 当属性设置为`true`，则集合包括请求的第一行和请求的行数的两个附加参数。When the property is set to `true`, the collection includes two additional parameters for the first row that is requested and the number of rows that are requested. 这两个参数的名称定义的和属性。These two parameters are named as defined by the and properties. `Select`方法应返回请求的指定索引处开始的行数。The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows, starting at the specified index. 由于数据可能不按页大小均匀划分，最后一页可能会包含更少的行。Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows. 因此，请求的行数是实际返回的行的最大数目。Thus, the number of rows that are requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned. 数据绑定控件关联的数据绑定控件上启用了分页，当调用`Select`方法的起始索引和所需的行数。When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required. 此外，如果属性设置，数据绑定控件呈现的页导航控件之前调用的方法。Additionally, if the property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls. 例如，如果控件的页大小为 5，并由指定的方法与启用了分页属性将返回 20，只有 4 页将显示页导航中。For example, if a control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method that is specified by the property returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager. 属性委托给属性的对象。The property delegates to the property of the object. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示 Web 页面、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够选择多少条记录显示在页中的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page. 网页包含控件属性设置为`true`。The Web page contains an control whose property is set to `true`. 属性设置为在查询中返回的记录总数的方法的名称。The property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query. 属性和属性设置为选择的方法中使用的参数的名称。The property and the property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method. 此页还包含控件。The page also contains a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示了一个处理程序事件的控件。The second example shows a handler for the event of the control. 中的处理程序集的代码属性设置为用户的选择。The code in the handler sets the property to the user's selection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/Default3.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/Default3.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了从客户表中检索数据的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table. 它包括一个名为方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，该值将赋给属性的控件。It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 该示例还包含一个名为方法`GetEmployeeCount`，该值将赋给属性的控件。The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the property of the control. 类使用 LINQ 来查询客户表。The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table. 有关更多信息，请参见[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/CS/App_Code/CustomerLogic.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_17/VB/App_Code/CustomerLogic.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FilterExpression { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FilterExpression : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置当调用由 属性指定的方法时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method that is specified by the property is called.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示在使用由 属性标识的方法或函数检索数据时应用的筛选表达式。

span.span: A string that represents a filtering expression that is applied when data is retrieved by using the method or function identified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持筛选数据时，才方法将返回或对象。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a or object. 有关使用的语法属性是一个格式字符串样式表达式。The syntax that is used for the property is a format string-style expression. 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法是接受的属性。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property. 如果您将参数添加到集合，您还可以包含格式字符串占位符。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders. 例如，包括`"{0}"`中要替换的参数值的表达式。For example, include `"{0}"` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 可以包括在参数属性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数的类型是字符串或字符类型，将参数括在单引号内。If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数的数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type. 集合中包含的参数，其计算结果中找到占位符属性。The collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the property. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. > [!NOTE] > 应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于或返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the or object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据中间层业务对象中检索数据的控件和一个控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 控件可以筛选数据，仅当用于检索数据的方法检索其作为或对象。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a or object. 出于此原因，属性标识的数据检索为业务对象方法。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a . 代码示例组成控件，控件，控件，和一个**提交**按钮。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，填入一个 Northwind Traders 员工的名称。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示有关中的名称由雇员的信息。The displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the . 若要检索有关另一个雇员的数据，请输入中的雇员的全名，然后单击**提交**按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the , and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选的数据由指定的方法来检索属性。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the method that is specified by the property. 它使用到中包含的参数进行求值的参数占位符集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符受单引号会因为参数类型是字符串类型，可能会包含空格。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型为数值或日期类型，则不需要引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是封装业务逻辑的类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，该类是一个包含仅加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层中检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 也很有帮助的此示例中，因为此示例依赖于您提供的 Northwind Traders 员工来演示筛选的完整名称。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的 Web 窗体代码示例使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms code examples that are provided. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Filtering As ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventHandler

summary.span: 执行筛选操作前发生。

span.span: Occurs before a filter operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来验证对值执行操作筛选器参数之前控件执行筛选器操作。Handle the event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the control performs a filter operation. 可以通过设置取消所选的操作的属性到`true`。You can cancel the selected operation by setting the property of the to `true`. 仅当引发该事件属性设置。The event is raised only if the property is set. 事件委托给的事件关联控件。The event delegates to the event of the that is associated with the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于或返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the or object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取与 字符串中的任何参数占位符关联的参数的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders in the string.

value.span: ，它包含与在 属性中找到的任何参数占位符相关联的一组参数。

span.span: A that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持筛选数据时，才方法将返回或对象。The control supports filtering data only when the method returns a or object. 有关使用的语法是一个格式字符串样式表达式。The syntax that is used for the is a format string-style expression. 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法是接受的属性。The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the property. 如果您将参数添加到集合，您还可以包含格式字符串占位符。If you add parameters to the collection, you can also include format string placeholders. 例如，包括`"{0}"`中要替换的参数值的表达式。For example, include `"{0}"` in the expression to substitute for parameter values. 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符集合。The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the collection. 可以包括在参数属性。You can include parameters in the property. 如果参数是字符串或字符类型，将参数括在单引号内。If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks. 如果参数的数值类型，则不需要引号。Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type. 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据中间层业务对象中检索数据的对象和一个控件来显示结果。The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an object to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 第二个代码示例提供了第一个代码示例中使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The second code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的已筛选的数据中间层业务对象中检索数据的控件和一个控件来显示结果。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 控件可以筛选数据，仅当用于检索数据的方法检索其作为或对象。The control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a or object. 出于此原因，属性标识的数据检索为业务对象方法。For this reason, the property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a . 代码示例组成控件，控件，控件，和一个**提交**按钮。The code example consists of a control, a control, the control, and a **Submit** button. 默认情况下，填入一个 Northwind Traders 员工的名称。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示有关中的名称由雇员的信息。The displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the . 若要检索有关另一个雇员的数据在，输入该员工的完整名称，然后单击**提交**按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, in the , enter the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button. 属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选将检索的数据属性。The property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the property. 它使用到中包含的参数进行求值的参数占位符集合。It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符受单引号会因为参数类型是字符串类型，可能会包含空格。In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces. 如果参数的类型为数值或日期类型，则不需要引号。If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required. 集合中包含一个参数绑定到的对象控件。The collection contains one parameter, a object that is bound to the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client. 在运行时只需将参数值替换为筛选器表达式，并将其应用于返回的对象方法。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the object that is returned by the method. 如果使用的属性作为一种安全措施可限制返回，筛选发生之前，必须验证参数值的项的数目。If you are using the property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供了前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 代码示例包含两个基本类：The code example consists of two basic classes: - `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是封装业务逻辑的类。The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类，该类是一个包含仅加载和保存的数据层的数据所需的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层中检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 也很有帮助的此示例中，因为此示例依赖于您提供的 Northwind Traders 员工来演示筛选的完整名称。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的 Web 窗体代码示例使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms code examples that are provided. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件支持只有一个数据源视图。The control supports only one data source view. 与所有数据源视图对象一样关联的数据源控件定义它的功能、 执行所有工作，才可从基础数据存储中检索数据并都执行操作，如排序，插入、 删除和更新。As with all data source view objects, the that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all the work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data storage, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating. 方法旨在由数据绑定控件，调用不是由页面代码。The method is intended to be called by data-bound controls, not by page code.
