remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来检查返回值或输出参数的值或确定后是否引发了异常操作已完成。Handle the event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an operation has completed. 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性中有与事件相关联的对象。The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the object that is associated with the event. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UpdateMethod { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件调用以更新数据的方法或函数的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the control invokes to update data.

value.span: 表示 用于更新数据的方法或函数的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the uses to update data.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制假定由标识的方法属性，而不是批处理中的方式执行更新。The control assumes that the method that is identified by the property performs updates one at a time, rather than in a batch. 属性委托给的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property delegates to the property of the object that is associated with the control. 请确保为配置的参数名称控件中集合选择的方法返回的列名称匹配。Make sure that the parameter names configured for the control in the collection match the column names that are returned by the select method. ## 对象生存期Object Lifetime 通过标识的方法属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。The method that is identified by the property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁由指定的方法的每次调用属性。If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the property is called. 可以处理并事件以使用指定的方法之前的业务对象调用属性。You can handle the and events to work with the business object before the method that is specified by the property is called. 你还可以处理由指定的方法后，将引发的事件调用属性。You can also handle the event that is raised after the method that is specified by the property is called. 如果业务对象实现接口，销毁该对象前调用方法。If the business object implements the interface, the method is called before the object is destroyed. 该方法是否`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则永远不会在创建业务对象并不能处理， ，和事件。If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the , , and events. ## 合并的参数Parameter Merging 参数添加到从三个源的集合：Parameters are added to the collection from three sources: - 从在运行时的数据绑定控件。From the data-bound control, at run time. - 从`UpdateParameters`元素，以声明方式。From the `UpdateParameters` element, declaratively. - 从事件处理程序，以编程方式。From the event handler, programmatically. 首先，通过数据绑定控件生成的任何参数添加到集合。First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the collection. 例如，如果控件绑定到具有各列的控件`Name`并`Number`，为参数`Name`和`Number`添加到集合。For example, if the control is bound to a control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection. 取决于参数的确切名称属性。The exact name of the parameter depends on the property. 这些参数的数据类型是`string`。The data type of these parameters is `string`. 下一步、 中列出的参数`UpdateParameters`添加元素。Next, the parameters that are listed in the `UpdateParameters` element are added. 如果中的参数`UpdateParameters`具有相同名称作为参数中已找到的元素修改集合，现有的参数以匹配的参数中指定的`UpdateParameters`元素。If a parameter in the `UpdateParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `UpdateParameters` element. 通常情况下，这用于修改的参数中的数据类型。Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter. 最后，您可以以编程方式添加和删除中的参数事件之前发生运行方法。Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the event, which occurs before the method is run. 对参数进行合并后，解析方法。The method is resolved after the parameters are merged. 下一节中讨论方法解析。Method resolution is discussed in the next section. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需用到的参数值替换属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## 方法解析Method Resolution 当调用方法时，从数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`UpdateParameters`元素和参数中的新增所有合并事件处理程序。When the method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `UpdateParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the event handler are all merged. （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。控制然后尝试查找要调用的方法。(For more information, see the preceding section.) The control then attempts to find a method to call. 首先，它会查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与属性。First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the property. 如果不找到任何匹配项，则引发异常。If no match is found, an exception is thrown. 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names. 例如，假设由指定的类型属性具有两个方法名为`UpdateARecord`。For example, suppose a type that is specified by the property has two methods named `UpdateARecord`. 一个`UpdateARecord`具有一个形参`ID`，和其他`UpdateARecord`具有两个参数`Name`和`Number`。One `UpdateARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `UpdateARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`. 如果集合具有名为只有一个参数`ID`，则`UpdateARecord`方法替换只是`ID`调用参数。If the collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `UpdateARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called. 参数的类型不会签入解析方法。The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods. 参数的顺序不重要。The order of the parameters does not matter. 如果设置属性，以不同方式解析方法。If the property is set, the method is resolved in a different way. 方法中指定的名称查找中指定属性，它采用一个参数的类型的属性。The looks for a method with the name that is specified in the property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the property. 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter. ## Examples 以下三个示例显示 Web 页面、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够检索和更新 Northwind 数据库中的员工表中的记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示包含两个网页控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示数据库中的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索、 显示和修改用户所选员工记录中的数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示了处理程序和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序序列化对象，其中包含员工表中检索到的数据。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序反序列化包含正在更新数据记录的原始数据的视图状态中的对象。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象作为参数传递给 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始数据必须传递到数据库，以便可以使用它来检查数据是否已由另一个进程修改。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了与 Northwind 数据库进行交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询和更新雇员表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类表示 Northwind 数据库和雇员表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关更多信息，请参见[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UpdateParameters As ParameterCollection

summary.span: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 属性指定的方法使用的参数。

span.span: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the method that is specified by the property.

value.span: ，包含由 属性指定的方法使用的参数。

span.span: A that contains the parameters used by the method that is specified by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称和类型中包含的参数集合的名称和中的参数的类型必须匹配方法签名。The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature. 受影响的参数名称属性和区分大小写。The parameter names are affected by the property and are case-sensitive. 集合中的参数取决于数据绑定控件，以声明方式，指定的参数和以编程方式添加的参数中的数据。The parameters in the collection depend on the data in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"参数合并"一节并[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。For more information, see the "Parameter Merging" section in and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4). 属性检索所包含的属性与之关联的对象控件。The property retrieves the property that is contained by the object that is associated with the control. 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see . > [!IMPORTANT] > 应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client. 运行时只需用到的参数值替换属性。The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the property. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件和多个要更新的数据对象。The first code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several objects to update data. 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件，控件和多个控件更新数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control, controls, and several controls to update data. 显示 Northwind 员工名称时控件用于输入和更新地址信息。The displays the name of a Northwind employee, while the controls are used to enter and update address information. 因为集合中包含绑定到的所选值，引发的按钮选择某个员工后才启用的操作。Because the collection contains a that is bound to the selected value of the , the button that raises the operation is enabled only after an employee is selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/objds12cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/objds12vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/CS/northwindemployee12.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_12/VB/northwindemployee12.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件来执行特定于应用程序，以验证参数的值或更改之前的参数值的其他初始化控件执行更新操作。Handle the event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the control performs the update operation. 参数都可用作访问的集合属性，它公开由对象。The parameters are available as an collection that is accessed by the property, which is exposed by the object. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 以下三个示例显示 Web 页面、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够检索和更新 Northwind 数据库中的员工表中的记录的数据访问类。The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable a user to retrieve and update records in the Employees table in the Northwind database. 第一个示例演示包含两个网页控件，控件，和一个控件。The first example shows a Web page that contains two controls, a control, and a control. 第一个控件和控件用于检索和显示数据库中的雇员姓名。The first control and the control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database. 第二个控件和控件用于检索、 显示和修改用户所选员工记录中的数据。The second control and the control are used to retrieve, display, and modify the data from the employee record that is selected by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 第二个示例显示了处理程序和事件。The second example shows handlers for the and events. 事件处理程序序列化对象，其中包含员工表中检索到的数据。The event handler serializes the object that contains data that was retrieved from the Employee table. 序列化的对象存储在视图状态。The serialized object is stored in view state. 事件处理程序反序列化包含正在更新数据记录的原始数据的视图状态中的对象。The event handler deserializes the object in view state that contains the original data for the data record that is being updated. 包含原始数据的对象作为参数传递给 Update 方法。The object that contains the original data is passed as a parameter to the Update method. 原始数据必须传递到数据库，以便可以使用它来检查数据是否已由另一个进程修改。The original data must be passed to the database so that it can be used to check whether the data has been modified by another process. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/Default.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/Default.aspx.vb#2)] 第三个示例显示了与 Northwind 数据库进行交互的数据访问类。The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database. 类使用 LINQ 来查询和更新雇员表。The class uses LINQ to query and update the Employees table. 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类表示 Northwind 数据库和雇员表。The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Employees table. 有关更多信息，请参见[如何：在 Web 项目中创建 LINQ to SQL 类](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081). [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/CS/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_18/VB/App_Code/EmployeeLogic.vb#5)]
